description:
Woof!
That's what I thought when I first met Bruno. Muscular, hairy, and built to fuck!
I was really quite fascinated by Bruno's body hair. His arms are really hairy, and so are his legs. His chest is trimmed and I think he shaves or trims his ass so who knows how fierce that gets!
He's 28 years old and was born in the United States, but his family is from Ecuador and he's lived there on and off.
Bruno is straight and a personal trainer by profession. When I asked him about his work I discovered something very interesting: almost all of his clients are women.
When I asked him about it, he said, "I don't like training men. The women they are much more fun."
Yeah, he's straight!
title: Bruno
